name: The train of terror
description:
Experience swedish public transport at it's finest!
(only windows version is tested, + you might need a decent computer to play this!)

Unzip and run! Enjoy!

Created during a 5 day gamejam at spelkollektivet.

Credits
"Team Cuddlefish"

with
